name: Royal Duck Runaway: Prologue
description:
Royal Duck Runaway is a single-player 2D Puzzle Room-Escape game, featuring Christopher's escape plan.  Conquering the Castle is not an easy feat, can you help the little duckling escape from the Prince's grasp?

The "Prologue" version is a Demo to the title.  We have incorporated a lot of our ideas for this game into the Demo, which would expand into further stages for the actual release.  For our 4th month of learning game development, this is the longest project we've had so far, and we thoroughly enjoyed the development process!  We've dedicated ourselves to a different art style compared to our previous games as well as slightly more complex programming.  We've definitely learnt a lot from developing this game, and we hope you'll enjoy the Demo as much as we do!

Available on WebGL, MacOS & Windows.

CONTROLS

Simple mouse / trackpad controls anyone can master.

AUDIO CREDIT

A special shoutout to the extremely awesome royalty-free audio sources which we've used on Royal Duck Runaway: Prologue.

FEEDBACK WELCOME

As this is a Demo of Royal Duck Runaway, we're going to need all the feedback we can get to help with developing the actual title.  Please let us know if you find any bugs for us to squash or things that annoy you when playing the game!

CONTACT / FOLLOW US

Follow us on Instagram @twopigs.studio / Twitter @twopigsstudio to join us on our game development journey with regular game development progress and making art for games!  A DM on instagram would be the easiest way to reach us.  You may also contact us at twopigs.studio@gmail.com.

Join our Discord Server for updates to Royal Duck Runaway: Prologue as well as our upcoming content! >  https://discord.gg/AXED9tW
